description: Enterprise-grade Apache Web Server monitoring dashboard with worker utilization, request throughput, connection stats, and performance metrics

targets.expr: (sum(apache_workers{state="busy", environment=~"$environment", team=~"$team", instance=~"$instance"}) by (instance) / sum(apache_workers{environment=~"$environment", team=~"$team", instance=~"$instance"}) by (instance)) * 100

(sum(apache_workers{state="busy", environment=~"$environment", team=~"$team", instance=~"$instance"}) by (instance) / sum(apache_workers{environment=~"$environment", team=~"$team", instance=~"$instance"}) by (instance)) * 100

title: Apache Web Tier Monitoring
